title: Preparing to Be a Help Meet
description: I can think of nothing I want more than someone to truly love me.You spend your time pining away for your one true love and suddenly...you're married and it is a lot more than you bargained for. Now is the hour you should be preparing to be a wifeâ€”to be a help meet.What does a good guy really look for in a girl?Are you a Dreamer, Servant or Go-to Gal?Do you know what to pray for your man-to-be?Should you tell a guy you like him?Can you know God's will in choosing a husband?
author: Debi Pearl
